Poison Enchantment

Description

The Poison enchantment has a chance to poison enemies when they are hit by the weapon. Poisoned enemies take damage over time.

Mechanics

- The chance to poison an enemy is based on the weapon's level - When triggered, applies the Poison status effect for several turns - Poison damage is dealt at the start of the poisoned creature's turn - Particularly effective against enemies with high HP

Source Code

- Java: Poison.java - The effect is applied in the proc() method with probability increasing with weapon level
